scripts.test:ci: yarn workspace gatsby-plugin-federation build && yarn test:develop && yarn clean && yarn test:production && yarn test:production:disabled-ssr
scripts.clean: yarn workspace host clean & yarn workspace remote clean
scripts.remote:production: yarn workspace remote build && yarn workspace remote serve
scripts.host:production: yarn workspace host build && yarn workspace host serve
scripts.test:production:disabled-ssr: cross-env MF_SSR=false start-server-and-test remote:production 8002 host:production 8001 test:production:disabled-ssr:run
